reviews.review_msg: Took IS 265 and I can say it was probably the most boring class ive taken in my 4 years at uni. She is very nice and gives only 1 hour of readings per week which is very appreciated but wow ive never dreaded going to a lecture this much. I feel as though her rate my prof ratings are pretty overblown or maybe for her upper division classes

Anushay Malik is a great prof! Super into the class material, and genuinely wants the students to understand and engage the material. Definitely have to read the material a few times to pick out key themes, but if you pay attention in class, it will help! Would highly recommend taking a class with her
